title: Beauty and Meaning Today - with Andrew Gould
description:
Andrew Gould is an architectural designer and liturgical artist with whom I often collaborate.  His work is rich in an exploration of traditional principles coupled with an attention to the particularities of context as well as a hint of fantasy.   I explore his approach to creation and his worldview.  

For Andrew's architectural work:  https://www.newworldbyzantine.com/

His liturgical art.:  http://nwbstudios.com/

My links: 

subscribestar: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonathan-pageau
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

The podcast: https://soundcloud.com/jonathan-pagea...
website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicW...
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
